column1: The contents of paragraph 17 of the Petition of the Petitioners which have been admitted
by the 2nd and 3rd Respondents, are as follows;

column2: “However, after a long process, including several expert committee reports and two Cabinet
sub-committees, a Cabinet decision was taken on 12th June 2018 to, inter alia, grant priority

column1: to  medical  officers  with  post  graduate  qualifications

column2: appointing officers to all posts except certain post identified separately, for which officers with

column1: post graduate qualifications in community medicine would be granted priority”
